caption: This is a review of their customer service. I placed an order for delivery online. When the order appeared to be delivered online but nothing had been delivered, I called to get a status update. The person I spoke to on the phone at the restaurant was incredibly rude, tried to rush me off the phone and then hung up on me. I will think twice before ordering from this restaurant online again.
Best cuisine in the WORLD. Recommended for families & friends.

Oh I am so glad Jade Court is BACK!!!  I miss your Hong Kong Style cooking so much!  Fresh high quality ingredients, no msg, authentic, perfect texture like it used to be but the dining room is a lot more glamorous!!!  I got beef with rice noodles, peapod leafs, chili chicken and curried chicken casserole.  Cooked to perfection!  It brings back so much memories and great comfort on a rainy cold day.  Thanks Carol!!

Friendly and professional service at the efficient order/takeout menu. The food was outstanding -- and (though we ordered hours ahead) just out of the wok! Fresh, light, subtle flavors. We'll be back!

I'm addicted to this place now. The food is soo good and well worth the price. Also as a vegetarian, this is my number one go to. The tofu is well seasoned and the veggie rice is perfect, not too salty no too greasy just perfect. Highly recommend this place.

We've ordered from them a bunch of times this week because their food is just so good!  I really enjoyed their setup for picking up takeout orders. They have a window that opens to the sidewalk with a bell to get an employee's attention. They are quick, clean, attentive, and most of all DELICIOUS.  If you're looking for a new Chinese restaurant in Hyde Park area, this is definitely a must try.
So glad to have excellent Cantonese food in the neighborhood!

Ordered an entree today for lunch as a first time customer.  Unfortunately poor communication on one of our parts caused my order to be delivered incorrectly..  I called to get resolution. The female staff insisted that i did not request a certain dish.  Instead of correcting the error, it was recommended that i pay the full price for the correct dish.  When asked to speak with a manager she responded she was the manager. All of a sudden the phone drops and a gentlemen is speaking....  To sum up my first experience, it lacked customer service. It was rich with interrupted tones, and not listening to the customer's concerns.  Not wanting the corrected dish for free, which was thrown up in my face, but wanted a win win situation....  Never will support this place again.  Customer Service is known in Hyde Park as always outstanding.  Jade Court appears not to be a good fit for our community.

The old Jade Court on Racine was hands down the best Cantonese restaurant (if not the best Chinese restaurant altogether) in Chicago. Although I've only gotten takeout from here, I see no reason that's not still true.

Nice and quick service and staff. The food is superb in the area in turns of Chinese food – the flavor of the Szechuan eggplant was amazing. Packaging was nice and tidy. Overall a great addition to Hyde Park, hope it's here to stay.

I've been following Carol since her family owned the Phoenix in Chinatown, and then Jade Court over on Racine. The new and improved Jade Court in Hyde Park is everything I've been missing. It is the most exquisite Chinese food in the city. They will continue to live up to their reputation as the ONLY Michelin rated Chinese restaurant in the City of Chicago. The restaurant looks phenomenal, the food is better than it ever.

Ordered  The Szechuan chicken off the lunchtime menu, crispy shrimp rolls, egg drop soup, shrimp fried rice They were all absolutely delicious! The crispy shrimp rolls are small but  so tasty that by accident  I ate all four !😊  The shrimp fried rice was a little pricey (17.95) but it was delicious as well. The Szechuan chicken was absolutely scrumptious as was the salt and pepper chicken wings  . Everything was very fresh and very tasty ! I recommend it!

Had such a great takeout lunch from Jade Court today! Ordered egg rolls, Egg Foo Young, Kung Pao Chicken, and Beef with Broccoli  - and took it to the lakefront for a picnic on a gorgeous day. Everything was so fresh and flavorful and the portions were huge - enough for lunch and dinner. This was the best Chinese food I have had in such a long time and I will definitely be back again soon! Egg Foo Young and Kung Pao Chicken are my two absolute favorites and Jade Court's versions are amazing! Check them out and you will be so glad you did...

Absolutely delicious! I ordered delivery from Jade Court tonight, and I was so impressed with the quality of the food. It’s some of the best Chinese food I’ve ever had. I’ll definitely be ordering again!
